DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate performance of TRUFILL DCS and TRUFILL DCS ORBIT Detachable Coils in the treatment of aneurysms.
DOC.brief_title: COMPLEX Post Market Surveillance Electronic Registry
DOC.detailed_description: This Post Market Surveillance Registry collect baseline characteristics, aneurysmal features, procedural and follow-up information, and complications/adverse events on the performance intracranial aneurysms treated with the Trufill DCS Orbit detachable platinum coils.
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients with angiographically documented aneurysms, 2. Either ruptured or unruptured, 3. Aneurysm deemed by the attending neurointerventionalist to be acceptable candidates for endovascular embolization 1) Patient / Treatment outside of the approved labeling, indications for use.
